description: drawing in black and red for a fan; view of tiered landscape; man trees; long stairway at left; waterfall at center bottom; covered walkways; figures throughout; Mount Fuji in ULC
medium: Preparatory drawing for a print; ink and color on paper
text: Referring to Hie Jinja in Tokyo.
title: New Waterfall at Hienoyama
